name: blimp
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large aircraft without wings, consisting of a large bag filled with gas that is lighter than air and driven by engines. In the past passengers were carried in a structure hanging below.
gobigpicture/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages

Add to word list
Add to word list
an aircraft without wings, consisting of a very large bag that is filled with gas and has a structure attached to the bottom in which people ride, which moves and turns under power provided by engines
